Title: The Hand That Feeds You
Writer: Aaron Korsh (created by), Daniel Arkin, Sharyn Rothstein (story editor), Sandra Silverstein (story editor)
Actors: Gabriel Macht, Patrick J. Adams, Rick Hoffman, Meghan Markle
Plot: New developments threaten the deals to get both Mike and Frank Gallo out of prison, forcing Mike and Harvey to improvise. Rachel disagrees with Jessica's strategy in the Leonard Bailey case. Louis gets another round of bad news from Tara.
